Name: Rayball
About the game: Rayball is a VR shooter arcade game. The main idea is to destroy the enemies that fly to the player. Your main goal is not to die and score as many points as possible. You have only 5 lives, do not forget about it! Rayball has 3 difficulty levels: 360, 180 and 90 degrees. Now the game has one dynamic music track. The user uses hand blasters. We want to show the capabilities of the virtual reality industry. Thus, Rayball is a VR game that will improve the coordination of user actions.
